description:
In this course titled 'Hypnosis - Heal Enlarged Prostate With Self Hypnosis' By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn -

  • 1.What is Prostate?
  • a.The walnut sixe, doughnut-shaped male sex gland called the prostate gland is located below the urinary bladder and surrounds the upper portion of the urethra.
  • b.Enlarged Prostate occurs in half of the men over 60 and three quarters or more of the men over 70 years.
  • 2.How Self Hypnosis Can Help?
  • 1) Self hypnosis helps you to relax and calm down
  • 2) Self hypnosis helps maintain positive attitude
  • 3) Self hypnosis treats stress, anxiety, nervousness and depression successfully

Self hypnosis treats stress, anxiety, nervousness and depression successfully

It is for those men who are suffering from enlarged prostate in their body and are unable to get rid of the problems mentally and physically.

It is ideal for everyone who want to heal their general health,improve their mental health and heal their prostate disease mentally and physically.

This course contains a lot of exercises and more than 30 minutes of live video content designed over 8 lectures in English including bonuses.

This course contains-

Lecture 1: Introduction

Lecture 2: Remove Myths About Self Hypnosis

Lecture 3: Conscious Mind Vs Subconscious Mind

Lecture 4: How To Enter Into The State Of Self Hypnosis

Lecture 5: How To Master Self Hypnosis To Reprogram Your Subconscious Mind

Lecture 6: Guided Visualization Exercise: To Heal Enlarged Prostate

Lecture 7: Summary

Lecture 8: Bonus Exercise - Affirmations For Depression, Stress, Insomnia And Negativity
